settings.title: Total Balance - Go Beyond Multi-Vitamins
settings.description:
If you are going to take one supplement, then this is it. Way beyond a multi-vitamin, it’s a complete nutrient system with specifically tailored versions for men and women.

Manufactured in New Zealand with over 90 vitamins, minerals, enzymes, herbs and other nutrients, all designed to synergistically work together. Based on science and constantly updated for 20 years, we and 20,000+ customers believe that this is the most comprehensive supplement available.

settings.title: Calcification and Plaque
settings.description: Arteries play a fundamental role in maintaining proper blood circulation throughout the body, so it’s crucial to keep arteries clean and in good condition. Ingredients like vitamin K2 (MK4) show evidence of supporting calcium metabolism and may prevent the buildup of calcium in the arteries.

settings.title: Circulation and Blood Pressure
settings.description: Healthy circulation means balanced blood pressure. Maintaining a healthy level of nitric oxide is important for optimal blood circulation. Red spinach extract contains a rich source of nitrates which can be converted into nitric oxide to support healthy circulation and cardiovascular functions

settings.title: Inflammation and Cellular Support
settings.description: Excessive inflammation can contribute to high blood pressure and unbalanced cholesterol. DeltaGold® tocotrienol complex is the most potent anti-inflammatory vitamin E, which helps prevent lipid oxidation and support cardiovascular health. Other ingredients with potent anti-inflammatory properties also include fish oil, sea buckthorn fruit extract, grape seed extract and blackcurrant extract.

settings.title: Best Protection For Heart and Circulation
settings.richcontent:
It’s never too late to improve your cardiovascular health. Heart disease is largely preventable through lifestyle change and great supplementation. Xtendlife’s cardiovascular range is developed with the best ingredients, supported by science, to help you stay young at heart.

  • High strength of natural extract for heart and arterial health
  • Clinically-studied ingredients, bioavailable formula
  • Recommended by cardiologist Dr. Joel Kahn and health researchers.

settings.title: The Search for Health
settings.description:
Total Balance was born out of a personal quest by Warren Matthews, founder of Xtend-Life to increase his health span at the same time as he increased his life span. The journey started with vitamins and developed into a complete multi-nutrient solution, with minerals, enzymes, amino acids and age-defying nutrients, all in their premium forms, to support cellular health and keep all the systems of his body in balance.

In this video, Warren shares how it has helped support his family against the causes of aging for over 20 years.

settings.title: Manufactured in New Zealand from Quality Natural Ingredients
settings.description:
Total Balance, like all our supplements, is manufactured in our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in New Zealand, which is FDA registered and GMP certified.

We know that a supplement is only as good as the ingredients that go into it - ingredients of the same name can vary enormously in efficacy depending upon where they are sourced – that’s why we only use the natural, most bioactive forms of ingredients, which are better for your body and absorbed more completely.

To make Total Balance even more effective, the ingredients are protected by a special enteric coating to ensure that stomach acids don’t damage or destroy the nutrients before they reach the upper intestine where the body can make best use of them.

These extra steps are part of our commitment to making Total Balance the most comprehensive supplement available.

settings.title: Top Seller - A Multivitamin For Heart
settings.text:
Unique, Highly Advanced Natural Supplement

CX8 is formulated with highly researched ingredients backed by data to support calcium metabolism, circulation, and inflammation management. With eight potent ingredients, the CX8 formula offers you one of the most effective heart-health products available today.

Circulation and Calcification

CX8 contains a proprietary blend of protease enzymes (Nattozimes®) and vitamin K2 in MK-7 form. These well-researched ingredients present great evidence to support calcium metabolism and may prevent the buildup of calcium in the arteries.

Inflammation and Cellular Support

With DeltaGold® tocotrienol complex, the most potent anti-inflammatory vitamin E, CX8 helps to prevent lipid oxidation in CVD, and support cardiovascular and metabolic health.

Additional Antioxidants

This unique heart health supplement also contains additional antioxidants such as sea buckthorn fruit extract (CardiOmegia™, CyanthOx™30), rutin and New Zealand blackcurrant extract. These antioxidants provide excellent support for inflammation and heart health.

Vitamin D3

Each serving of CX8 also offers 1000IU of vitamin D3, to help maintain healthy blood flow and protect the heart and blood vessels.

Total Balance Premium is more than a multi-vitamin, it’s a complete nutrient system in one bottle.

settings.title: Life-Sustaining
settings.description: A strong heart with a healthy cardiovascular system is vital to our livelihood. Heart disease is the leading cause of death worldwide, which causes 1 out of every 4 deaths in the US. Statistics from the Heart Health Foundation show that cardiovascular diseases (CVD) affect nearly half of American adults. In Australia, ¾ of Australians are at risk of developing one  and 1 in 21 adults in New Zealand are living with CVD. CVD can cause symptoms anywhere in the body, sadly some symptoms and risk factors are “silent”. Hence it’s very important to take preventive actions to keep your heart healthy.

settings.title: Quality of Life
settings.description: Heart health is essential to overall good health. The heart pumps nutrient-rich blood throughout the body, supplying oxygen fuel, hormones, and a host of essential cells to organs. This contributes to overall wellbeing, energy levels, and the ability to engage in daily activities without fatigue or discomfort. Without a healthy heart and cardiovascular system, various adverse consequences can occur, which include reduced physical function, dysfunction or failure of vital organs, cardiovascular diseases, impaired oxygen and nutrient delivery, metabolic imbalances, hormonal disorders and more.

settings.title: Heart Health and Men
settings.description: Men often have a higher risk of developing cardiovascular diseases (CVD), including coronary artery disease, heart attack, stroke, and heart failure, at a younger age compared to women, this is due to various biological, hormonal, lifestyle, and behavioural factors. Men may engage in specific lifestyle behaviours that increase their risk of CAD, such as higher rates of tobacco use, excessive alcohol consumption, unhealthy dietary habits, and inadequate physical activity. These modifiable risk factors can accelerate the development of CAD and contribute to its onset at a younger age.

settings.title: Heart Health and Women
settings.description: Cardiovascular health is also critical for women. Although the higher estrogen hormone in women has been associated with some protective cardiovascular effects, however after menopause, when estrogen levels decline, women's risk of cardiovascular diseases may increase dramatically. Additionally, CVD risk in women can be under-recognised because women may experience atypical symptoms of CVD compared to men. These subtler or more diverse symptoms may not always be immediately recognized as signs of heart disease . Hence, understanding heart health risk factors and taking preventive care is vital for women.

settings.title: Digestion
settings.description:
• Enzymes to assist digestion
  • Maintain function of gut lining
  • Encourage regular bowel movements
  • Reduce gas and bloating

settings.title: Why is Heart Health so Important?

settings.text:
Adopting a heart-healthy lifestyle can significantly reduce the risk of developing heart-related conditions.

  1. A heart healthy lifestyle includes a balanced and heart-healthy diet, regular physical activity, avoid smoking, limit alcohol consumption and manage stress.
  2. Targeted supplementation can make all the difference to make sure that you are getting the proper amount that your body requires. As we age, essential nutrients such as omega-3, CoQ10, and vitamin K2 begin to slowly deplete and decrease in production rate (and absorption rate). These nutrients are crucial to our health and for promoting cardiovascular health and preventing disease.
